name: react-dom-model-tests
description: Whole system tests for react-dom-model packages
author: Charlie Jackson <contact@charliejackson.com>

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -project native/ios/reactdommodel.xcodeproj -scheme reactdommodel -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath native/ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 7
